resources.string:
Thanks for taking a look at WhoseLineIsItAnyway!

It's a fantastic app to help you get the service you need at the price you want, quickly and efficiently. Need something done? Or do you want to make some good money helping people out?

You've come to the right place!

Just enter a username to login or register and hit the button.


If you're a new user, we'll help you sign up, don't worry.

To our returning users, welcome back!
Connecting People. Getting Things Done.\nWelcome to WhoseLineIsItAnyway
Green-bordered images will be accepted, red are too large and will be rejected. To view an image blowup, tap the image. To remove an image, Long-Press it.
